messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR GEOFFREY COX
messages.content: AN HONEST AND DEDICATED MP, A FAIR DEAL FROM A NEW GOVERNMENT, A FRESH START FOR BROKEN BRITAIN

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Geoffrey Cox has a strong track record of serving your community both locally and in Westminster. He has never abused his expenses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fair deal from a new government
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only a Conservative government and an experienced, able and hardworking MP like Geoffrey Cox can deliver the changes that our area badly needs.
Only a new Conservative Government by David Cameron will deliver the change that Britain needs.

politicalExperience.achievements: Geoffrey Cox has worked hard as your local MP. He has a strong track record of serving your community both locally and in Westminster. He has never abused his expenses.

images.caption: GEOFFREY COX Vote to bring change to Torridge and West Devon on 6th May

leaflet.additionalNotes: ELECTION COMMUNICATION FOR TORRIDGE AND WEST DEVON
